Qwotable.changelog:
This is a beta release. It means that it is not guaranteed to be stable. If you find any issues, please send it to me.

What changed?

The app uses a color theme now as I was mad about the black and white theme not working.
The settings page got a new switch, the beta switch. Please enable it, if you want to get the beta updates. However, the beta updates possibility is ... beta now, so there might be issues. If you experience any, contact me.
Qwotable.changelogBeta: This is the same build so nothing has changed. It is for testing if everything works as it should
